nodes.text: Marqo's was a renowned eatery in D'larah, on the planet Demophon. It was owned by Cradjius Lucern, who took over after its founder fled before the impending Demophon system supernova. Lucern decided to capitalize on Marqo's reputation as a luxurious restaurant, keeping the name as he transformed it into a dark and moody gambling hall and cantina. Many of the people of D'larah saw Marqo's as a chance for escape, hoping to win enough gambling to buy passage off world.
